text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
──N-No way!!!

Lunchbox!! It's really gone!!
I should've gone back to look for it, right~!?
Sorry, I didn't have time for that...
──Sorry, Kogane! I really can't go back now!
Being busy is a good thing though...

──Ah, Sakuyan!
Did Kogatan already leave?!
Ah, just now. She ran off.

Huh!? Ah... the lunchbox...
It was left on the sofa, Kogatan...

She said it was amazing today! Even though
it might be too late, should I try to contact her?

If you want, I can contact Kogane.
Yuika is also going out, right?

Oh no, it's already that time!?
Sorry, Sakuyan, can I ask you a favor?

We're friends, so when we're busy, it's give and take.
I'll save my request for when it's really needed, okay?

──I won't let you say thanks for this...?
Even though we're both busy, Sakuyan...

Right now, it's my job to see you off.
Come on, is the time okay?

──Ah, geez!
Sorry for rushing! I'm off!

"The amazing lunchbox...
To the person who finds it, please enjoy!"
Ah, Kogane...

"Thank you. In that case, I'll gladly accept your kind offer.
I'll cherish Kogane's homemade food."
But eating alone...
just for a little bit...
